Bash(git tag -a "lessons-and-problems-working-together" -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
SATify Interactive Lessons + Practice Integration Complete - v2.0

🎯 Complete Educational Workflow Implemented:
• Skill Selection → Lesson Learning → Practice Application
• Seamless transition from conceptual learning to practical application
• Both lesson systems (🎯 Lessons & 📖 Interactive Lessons) working in parallel

• 11 lessons mapped directly to SAT skill codes (BOU, CID, COE, CTC, FSS, INF, SYN, TRA, TSP, WIC)

• Rich content support: strategy steps, bullet points, guided examples
• Automatic practice transition on lesson completion

🔗 Integrated Practice System:
• Fixed skill practice page visibility issues (display: none → block)
• Enhanced practice session initialization with proper element detection
• Automatic scrolling to practice questions for optimal user experience
• Comprehensive debugging throughout the lesson-to-practice flow

🛠️ Technical Excellence:
• Robust error handling and infinite loop prevention
• Cache-busting for JavaScript updates and browser cache management
• Created stub files to eliminate 404 errors during development
• Enhanced debugging and logging throughout the system

1. User selects skill from Interactive Lessons grid
2. Views complete lesson with slide navigation
